instructions.ar: انعطف يميناً قليلاً لتبقى على Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.da: Drej let til højre videre ad Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.de: Leicht rechts weiter auf Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Make a slight right to stay on Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ete dekstren al Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Dobla levemente a la derecha en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es-ES: Doble levemente a la derecha en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fi: Jatka loivasti oikeaan pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à droite pour rester sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.he: פנה קלות ימינה כדי להישאר על Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.hu: Forduljon enyhén jobbra, majd maradjon a Cool highway (Ref1) szakaszon
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kanan ke Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.it: Fai una leggera curva a destra per stare su Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ja: 斜め右に曲がり、Cool highway(Ref1)を進む
instructions.ko: 약간 우회전 하고 Cool highway (Ref1)로 가세요.
instructions.my: Cool highway( Ref1)ပေါ်တွင်နေရန် ညာဘက်အနည်းငယ်ကွေ့ပါ
instructions.nl: Rechts afbuigen om op Cool highway (Ref1) te blijven
instructions.no: Sving svakt til høyre for å bli værende på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Skręć w prawo w łagodny zakręt, aby pozostać na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva suave a direita para manter-se na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pt-PT: Vire ligeiramente à direita para se manter em Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ro: Virați ușor la dreapta pe Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните направо на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sl: Zavijte rahlo desno, da ostanete na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Sväng höger och fortsätt på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.tr: Cool highway (Ref1) üzerinde kalmak için sağa hafif dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть плавно праворуч щоб залишитись на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên phải để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.yo: Ṣe diẹ si ọtun lati duro si Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.zh-Hans: 前方稍向右转，继续在Cool highway（Ref1）上行驶
